participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily has a passion for movies and values her relationships with family and friends.
participant_1.background: I believe that I have a good relationship with my family. I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies. I have freckles all over my face. During the week, I work as a barista. I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and family-oriented, Jason enjoys outdoor activities with friends and has a deep appreciation for his loved ones.
participant_2.background: I would love to have lunch with my geocaching friends and share our adventures. I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun. I like to sew. My comic book collection was stolen from my apartment when I was away on vacation. I'm proud of my daughter and mom!

content.text: I like to collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies.
I like to sew and my mom is a seamstress.
I sew costumes for myself and my daughter.
I love to go to the movies, what is your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is Titanic and I am proud of my daughter and mom.
I like Titanic too. My family is important to me and I like to spend time with them.
I also like to go geocaching with my friends.
Have you ever been on vacation?
Yes, I have been to Hawaii and my favorite place is the beach.
I like to watch movies at home on my big screen TV.
I like to go to the movies because the sound system is better.
What do you think of my freckles?
I like to work as a barista. It is a fun job.
I like to go to coffee shops and have coffee.
I often neglect my creative work in favor of my job.
I think it is important to have a creative outlet.
